column6: action
Add the required aria-expanded attribute to the combobox widget.
Add the required aria-valuenow attribute to the scrollbar widget.
Add the required aria-checked attribute to the checkbox widget.

Add the required aria-selected attribute to the option widget.

combobox widget has the required aria-expanded attribute with the value true.

option widget has the required aria-selected attribute with the value true.
slider widget has the required aria-valuenow attribute with the value 10.
switch widget has the required aria-checked attribute with the value true.
